title: i paid for transfer and i lost my account !
body: i just transferred my account from , EUNE To NA1 and i lost it it shows me that i am level one !

replies.body:
When this happens, it is usually when people confuse their Username and their Summoner Name.  It seems that you have a smurf you created on NA in the past, and the Username you are entering is for that smurf, not for the account you had in EUNE.  Is it the same username?  Or were you prompted to change your Username when you transferred?  Have you triple-checked that you are entering in the right one?

If you are still having issues, reply back and let me know!
